segments.text: Ernie , I'm really excited about starting this band together . We're going to be the two coolest students on campus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know ! It's gonna be great . But what kind of music do you think we should play ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good question . You know I love hip hop , so maybe we can play some Vanilla Ice songs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm ... Vanilla Ice ? I know his most famous song , " Ice Ice Baby , " but I don't know his other songs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's OK . You can buy his songs on iTunes and listen to them .
segments.speaker: S1
